column1: note: the first letters for starting words are a,c,d,e,i,p,s (among others)É first few weeks only focus on words starting with these letters (I will encounter roughly 30 words of each)

column2: to give up, often in a formal manner
a secret group of plotters or schemers
the deliverate act of delaying and playing instead of working
resulting from or showing sincere and intense conviction
